A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m an original trilogy fan. I’ve watched Rogue One and liked it. But Force Awakens and Last Jedi are huge disappointments. No suspense\, no payoff. Beloved characters are brought back as token pieces to put fans in the seats. Plot holes galore. Storylines that carry no weight and go nowhere. Easy and dumb solutions. Large portions of film that make need sense. Had some nice small wins and special affects were good. I feel sorry for all the hard work that goes into these films that’s waisted on bad story. Disney has let us down with new Star Wars arc so far and waisted the original arc again with no payoff.
